name: URadialIntMask
doc: This function first defines a radial integer field equal to Interior-value inside a sphere / Exterior-value outside. This field will be used alongside the particle input value and the mask condition to compute the particle output value.

Radius: Radius of the radial mask field
Position: Center position of the radial mask field
InteriorValue: If the sample distance from the center is less than radius, the intermediate value will be set the interior value
ExteriorValue: If the sample distance from the center is greater than radius, the intermediate value will be set the exterior value
SetMaskCondition: If the mask condition is set to always the output value will be the intermediate one. If set to not interior/exterior the output value will be the intermediate one if the input is different from the interior/exterior value

methods.name: SetRadialIntMask
